messages.body:
Dear Mr. Conehead,

Thanks for your mail and your interest that you will assist me in this 
transaction. I have to let you know that because of my positon in my 
ministry,  i will  introduce you to a lawyer who will be representing you 
over here, why i take care of thing as an insider, i hope you will 
understand so that your claims will be very genuine and back up with legal 
papers from the lawyer which i am going to put in good use so that the fund 
can be transfer into an account that will be nominated by you. Pls get in 
touch with the lawyer as soon as possible. This is his contact:

Name: Barrister David Kofi.
Phone : 00233 244 937981.
Email: davekofi2@yahoo.com.

I have already told him about you, he will prepare all neccessary legal 
papers to present you as a subsidairy donor to the project that was excuted 
by the Australain firm, and i will act as an inside to see to the success of 
this transaction. Pls i need your restrict confidentiality in this matter, 
because of my present position. I sincerely wish to hear from you soon.

Regards,
Fred Omar.

HE HAS TOLD ME THE PART HE WANTED YOU TO PLAY, IN THAT
CASE I WILL NEED THE FOLLOWING INFORMATION FROM YOU SO
THAT I CAN APPLY FOR AN APPLICATION FORM IN YOUR NAME
FROM THE MINISTRY OF JUSTICE.

YOUR NAME AND FULL ADDRESS, AGE, OCCUPATION, MARITIAL
STATUS, AND YOUR TELPHONE/FAX NUMBERS. AS SOON AS YOU
SEND THIS INFORMATION, I WILL AQUIRE THE FORM AND SEND
IT TO YOU, WHICH YOU ARE REQUIRED TO FILL AND SEND IT
BACK TO ME. THIS IS MY NUMBER: 00233 244 937981. CALL
ME FOR FURTHER DISCUSSION.

HOPING TO HEAR FROM YOU.
REGARDS,
DAVID KOFI Esq.

Dear Beldar,

I saw your mail, i will apply for the form in the
Minisrty of Justice on monday and send it to you, fill
and return it back so that i can take it to the High
Court to get the subsequent power of attorney, which
will legally bring you in as a subsidairy donor to the
project that was executed, so that you will be in
confirmity with the law and legal processes for the
bank to effect the transfer into an account that will
be nominated by you. 

i did tried your line but was on answering machine,
pls endeavour  to call me on this number also: 00233
244 937981, so that we can interactive a little, and
if you recieve this mail.Say me well to your family.

Hoping to hear from you.
Regards,
David Kofi Esq.

messages.body:
Greetings Mr. Omar!

I have received the form from Mr.Kofi and will fill it
out and return to him as soon as possible.

I am happy this lucky deal has come to me as I am a
little upset right now.  Prymatt took Connie my
daughter and left me last night in a rage.  I am
afraid she may return to our old planet.

Oh well, at least I see a pot of gold at the end of
this rainbow.  If she divorces me she may get half of
the money and I am a little worried about that.

nanu-nanu,
Beldar Eugene Conehead

messages.body:
Dear Mr Beldar,

Below is an application letter that you will have to
fill the gaps completely and immediately send it as an
email to the Head office of the International
Commericial Bank Limited Ghana. Also give the
correct bank account informations where you want the
funds to be transfered. Also confirm to me if you
recieve the attachment of the initial Statutory
Declaration from the High court of Ghana.

Below is a form that you need to fill and send to the
BANK, copy and fill the form before sending. I will
expect your mail immediately you recieve a response
from tha bank and always get back to me when you are
been asked any question that is beyond your
explanation.

Awaiting your response.

Regards,

David Kofi Esq.


FILL THE FORM BELOW:
.......................................................


TO THE,
Operation Manager, Mr. Michael Fifi Mensah
International Commercial Bank of Ghana Limited,
Accra, Ghana.
Tel: +233-20-8220911.
Fax: +233-28-275766
E-mail: info@icb-ltd.com


APPLICATION FOR THE RELEASE OF MY FUND VALUED
US$15,000,000:00


I Mr................, the legitimate beneficiary of
the Escrow call account NO#: 0661818092 swift code:
INCEGHAC with your bank and had a closing balance
before his date amounting to Fifteen Million 
United States Dollars (US$15,000,000:00) ONLY.

I hereby apply that the above fund be remitted to my
bank account presented below as a legitimate owner of
the foresaid fund according to your remittance rules
and regulations, my bank co-ordinates are stated
below:

My full Name:


Mailing Address:



Bank Name:

Bank Address:


A/C No: 



Routing NO; (if any)


I will appreciate if the said transfer into my
nominated Bank account is made as soon as possible.
You can contact me on phone:

.
Fax:


..or Email:

.. if the need
arises.

Thanks for your anticipated co-operations

Yours faithfully,

messages.body:
Mr. Kofi,

Sorry fo r the late response.  i can barely type right
now.  two nights ago my wife Prymatt and i got into a
large fight and she shot me with the laser gun.  i am
currently on medication and am a little weak
recovering.  i just got home from the hospital and she
is currently in jail.  my daughter is a wreck.  give
me a couple of days to digest the information you sent
me and i will get back to you asap.  i feel a little
drunken right now and can hardly get out of bed.

so much going on.

shall i write mr. omar about the bad news or shall you
tell him for me?

nanu-nanu,
beldar "the great" conehead

nanu-nanu,

I SAW YOUR MAIL, I AM SO SORRY FOR ALL THAT IS GOING
ON IN YOUR LIFE RIGHT NOW, I WISH YOU A SPEEDY
RECOVERY, I WILL TELL MR OMAR ABOUT THIS, BECAUSE IF
YOU TELL HIM NOW, IT WILL LOOKS AS IF YOU CANNOT
CONCENTRATE IN HANDLING THIS TRANSACTION, AND HE MIGHT
LOOSE CONFIDENCE IN YOU, SO I KNOW HOW TO GO ABOUT
THAT.

AS SOON AS YOU CONTACT THE BANK, PLS LET ME KNOW, SO
THAT  ANY QUESTION THAT THEY MIGHT ASKED I WILL ASSIST
YOU IN GETTING  THE REPLY, PLEASE STAY CALM AND OUT OF
TROUBLE, BE CAREFUL WITH YOUR WIFE, AND TAKE CARE OF
YOUR DAUGHTER. I HOPE YOUR WIFE WILL NOT BLOW THIS
DEAL? DO NOT  LET HER KNOW YOUR MOVES NOW, BECAUSE SHE
MIGHT BLOW IT, WE DON,T WANT THAT TO HAPPEN.

HOPING TO HEAR FROM YOU.
REGARDS,
DAVID KOFI Esq.

messages.body:
greeting from remulak mr. kofi!

as you requested i sent the information to the bank. 
I will need the money as soon as possible before the
police track me down.  unfortunately, my wife came
back, i was high on some drugs and alcohol, i hit her
on the head with a baseball bat.  i think she might be
dead.  i need to get out of here quit.  she is in the
basement.  i can't bare to go down there and see her. 
i have been cleaning the blood all night.  i am very
scared and do not know what to do.

how long will it take to get the money so that i can
flee this world?

beldar conehead

Yours faithfully, Beldar "the great" Eugene Conehead

messages.body:
Mr Kofi,

I have sent the information to the bank.  I am waiting
for the transfer.  My wife didn't make it and I buried
her in the backyard last night.  My daughter Connie
has no idea where her mother is.  I had to lock her in
her room while doing this tragic deed.  My back hurts
so bad today from all the digging.  I am sad for her. 
I am not worried anymore.  Nobody will find out for
weeks.

The bank I anxiously await a reply from.

nanu-nanu,
beldar eugene conehead

messages.body:
from Bank, Mr. Michael Fifi Mensah:

Attn: Beldar Eugene Conehead.

SUBJECT-RE: TRANSFER/PAYMENT SUM OF US$15M 

Sir, 

Your massage dated 26/09/05 has been received by the INTERNATIONAL COMMERCIAL 
BANK LIMITED GHANA. We are now glad to inform you that your fund has been 
located in our computer database also it was deposited in an Escrow Account. 

Also we wish to inform you that we have received your attached drivers 
license and have confirmed your identity as true, also an application letter 
of authority which was earlier sent on the 26th September needs to be 
officially notarized. According to our Bank's logistics it is necessary 
therefore that your application letter is officially notarized, making it 
authentic, since you are not here in person to submit this application. It 
will also interest you to hear that from our legal department it will cost you 
$350.00 only to notarize it and soon it is notarized the approval will be 
considered. 

You are hereby advice to send the amount of $350.00 to MR.GEORGE MONG in our 
account department by Western Union Money Transfer. Soon the money is 
received and the application notarized and approval secured, the copy will be 
faxed to you for your perusal also the transfer of your fund will be 
effected. 

Treat Urgently 

Yours faithfully 

MR. Michael F.Mensah. (Foreign Operation Manager) 

CC: MR. BENARD DINKOR SEC.MINISTRY OF FINANCE. 

CC: BANK OF GHANA. 

CC: FILE.
messages.raw:
ICB GHANA

Also we wish to inform you that we have received your attached drivers license and have confirmed your identity as true, also an application letter of authority which was earlier sent on the 26th September needs to be officially notarized. According to our Bank's logistics it is necessary therefore that your application letter is officially notarized, making it authentic, since you are not here in person to submit this application. It will also interest you to hear that from our legal department it will cost you $350.00 only to notarize it and soon it is notarized the approval will be considered.

You are hereby advice to send the amount of $350.00 to MR.GEORGE MONG in our account department by Western Union Money Transfer. Soon the money is received and the application notarized and approval secured, the copy will be faxed to you for your perusal also the transfer of your fund will be effected.

MR. Michael F.Mensah. (Foreign Operation Manager) CC: MR. BENARD DINKOR SEC.MINISTRY OF FINANCE. CC: BANK OF GHANA. CC: FILE.

messages.body:
Greeting from Remulak Mr. Fifi:

Fifi, asking of me I do not understand.  Sent by Western Union money order 
you ask of me.  In the amount of $3500, the money order will be sent to you.  
Information to send the money order via Western Union I need from you.  
From the bank today or tomorrow I will retrieve the funds to be sent.

Information for Western Union I need from you.

Money from escrow I need from you quickly.  From this world I must flee.

nanu-nanu,
Beldar Eugene Conehead

messages.body:
Greetings Mr. Kofi:

The police will never find out.  I dismembered her
before the burial so she will decay faster.  I covered
the limbs with lime.  Several episodes of a TV show
here in US called Forensic Files gave me the idea of
pulling the teeth and removing the fingerprints before
disposing.  Unrecognizable.

Anyway, more importantly to me is the money you are
going to transfer.  I plan to flee to Mexico where I
will meet my friend Spock and from there we will use
his spacecraft to flee to our home planet.

As for the bank, I wrote the bank yesterday asking
where to send the $3500 to.  I withdrew the monies
today and await more information.

nanu-nanu,
Beldar Conehead
messages.raw:
(i am not sure how things have become so vial.)

BELDAR CONEHEAD

Greetings Mr. Kofi:

The police will never find out. I dismembered her before the burial so she will decay faster. I covered the limbs with lime. Several episodes of a TV show here in US called Forensic Files gave me the idea of pulling the teeth and removing the fingerprints before disposing. Unrecognizable.

Anyway, more importantly to me is the money you are going to transfer. I plan to flee to Mexico where I will meet my friend Spock and from there we will use his spacecraft to flee to our home planet.

As for the bank, I wrote the bank yesterday asking where to send the $3500 to. I withdrew the monies today and await more information.

nanu-nanu,
Beldar Conehead

messages.body:
Greetings Fifi,

As I am running out of time.  I need to verify with
you. I think you might have made a mistake.  I took
out the sum of $3500 to send you and I am afraid you
misprinted the amount in your last email.  You put
$350.  Please let me know asap if this is correct so I
can send the money order to you.

nanu-nanu,
beldar "big pickle" conehead

(trying to get them to change the amount from $350 to $3500)

Greetings Fifi,

As I am running out of time. I need to verify with you. I think you might have made a mistake. I took out the sum of $3500 to send you and I am afraid you misprinted the amount in your last email. You put $350. Please let me know asap if this is correct so I can send the money order to you.

nanu-nanu,
beldar "big pickle" conehead

Greeting Mr. KOFI,

Things are not so good here.  The police are starting to snoop around.  Time
is running out for me.  Please wire the money into my bank account as fast
as you possibly can.

I have transmitted the money in the amount of $1000.  I put a little extra 
in there for all of your kindness to me and your trust in the matter of 
Prymatt, my wife and the whole situation.

Unfortunilty, I may need to dispose of my daughter whom I love so very much.
She is asking to many questions of me and it will be hard to disappear with
her by my side.  Please do not tell anyone of this.

I have submitted the information concerning the Western Union money order to the bank.

messages.body:
Mr. Kofi, does it actually sound like Coffee,

There has been some problems with my emails lately.  A lot of garbage
text.  Not sure as to why. A copy of the western union money order 
receipt is attached.  I thought I attached it to the last email.  

I have decided to take on a new wife.  Is there anyone from your country 
that you know who would be interested?  I will pay good money for a beautiful 
women.  I am a weathly man with much money and am a widow with one daughter 
currently.  I also look very young for my age, per my drivers license photo.  
Please let me know.  I am very interested in S&M, etc, as I have a dungeon in 
my basement.  My daughter is currently there chained.  My schizophrenia causing 
me to say a lot of stuff I should not and do things I should not do.  I have only 
been out of that state hospital for about 8 months.

The bank has all my information.  I feel insulted when your emails are so short.  
I have been developing this relationship with you for so long and you never talk 
to me about my issues.  Is all you care about is the transaction.  

nanu-nanu,
beldar conehead

(sending him fake western union receipt scan)

Mr. Kofi, does it actually sound like Coffee,

There has been some problems with my emails lately. A lot of garbage text. Not sure as to why. A copy of the western union money order receipt is attached. I thought I attached it to the last email.

I have decided to take on a new wife. Is there anyone from your country that you know who would be interested? I will pay good money for a beautiful women. I am a weathly man with much money and am a widow with one daughter currently. I also look very young for my age, per my drivers license photo. Please let me know. I am very interested in S&M, etc, as I have a dungeon in my basement. My daughter is currently there chained. My schizophrenia causing me to say a lot of stuff I should not and do things I should not do. I have only been out of that state hospital for about 8 months.

The bank has all my information. I feel insulted when your emails are so short. I have been developing this relationship with you for so long and you never talk to me about my issues. Is all you care about is the transaction.

nanu-nanu,
beldar conehead
